messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Krispy Kreme
messages.msgSnippet: sometimes we get 2 dozen and eat 1 on the way home. and yes they are too good to quit with 1. tina
messages.messageBody:
sometimes we get 2 dozen and eat 1 on the way home. and yes they are too good
to quit with 1.
tina

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Krispy Kreme
messages.msgSnippet: I think that they are too sweet and they give me a horrible case of heartburn.  I know , I am in the minority. Jane
messages.messageBody:
I think that they are too sweet and they give me a horrible case of
heartburn. I know , I am in the minority.

Jane


On Wed, 1 May 2002 09:37:20 EDT, you wrote:

>In a message dated 5/1/02 7:54:09 AM Central Daylight Time,
>Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
><<
> Am I the only person on the planet that thinks Krispy Kremes are
> AWFUL?? >>
>
>I think so.
>We have a Krispy Kreme shop that we drive past on the way home from the
>beach. If the "hot donuts now" sign is flashing, there is no stopping us!!!
>A warm, fresh-glazed Krispy Kreme is about the best thing I've ever
>eaten....melts in your mouth. mmmmmmmm.....
>Ren

messages.subject: Krispy Kreme
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/1/02 7:54:09 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/1/02 7:54:09 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
Am I the only person on the planet that thinks Krispy Kremes are
AWFUL?? >>

I think so.
We have a Krispy Kreme shop that we drive past on the way home from the
beach. If the "hot donuts now" sign is flashing, there is no stopping us!!!
A warm, fresh-glazed Krispy Kreme is about the best thing I've ever
eaten....melts in your mouth. mmmmmmmm.....
Ren

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Krispy Kreme
messages.msgSnippet: The bad thing about the fresh Krispy Kremes is that you cannot eat just one. lol Kathy Mom to Logan 14, Andrew 9, Alexander 5 1/2, and announcing the newest
messages.messageBody:
The bad thing about the fresh Krispy Kremes is that you cannot eat just one.
lol

Kathy
Mom to Logan 14, Andrew 9, Alexander 5 1/2,
and announcing the newest addition to our family -
Christopher David born 9/20/2001, 4:14pm,
7 pounds 4 oz, 19 3/4 inches long.
Pro: Breastfeeding, childled weaning, Whole Food eating, cloth diapering,
Attachment Parenting, and Unschooling/Homeschooling.
----WAHMall Screen name (mom2fourboys) Ebay Screen Name (Mom2boyss)

"Some people think we put our lives on hold to raise a child, but we know
that to hold a child IS life"
